thread.title: BRIEF-Northland Power Says Taiwan Bureau Of Energy Allocated 300 MW To Hai Long 2 Offshore Wind Farm

title: BRIEF-Northland Power Says Taiwan Bureau Of Energy Allocated 300 MW To Hai Long 2 Offshore Wind Farm

organizations.name: brief-northland power says taiwan bureau of energy
hai long 2 offshore wind farm reuters

text:
April 30, 2018 / 1:50 PM / Updated 12 minutes ago BRIEF-Northland Power Says Taiwan Bureau Of Energy Allocated 300 MW To Hai Long 2 Offshore Wind Farm Reuters Staff 1 Min Read
April 30 (Reuters) - Northland Power Inc:
* NORTHLAND POWER INC- THE TAIWAN BUREAU OF ENERGY ALLOCATED 300 MW TO THE HAI LONG 2 OFFSHORE WIND FARM UNDER TAIWAN'S FEED-IN-TARIFF PROGRAM Source text: ( bit.ly/2r7ztW4 ) Further company coverage:
